turns.content: Could you provide a list of video game characters voiced by Troy Baker?

Sure, here are some video game characters voiced by Troy Baker:

1. Joel in The Last of Us
2. Booker DeWitt in BioShock Infinite
3. Rhys in Tales from the Borderlands
4. Pagan Min in Far Cry 4
5. Talion in Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor
6. Kanji Tatsumi in Persona 4
7. Snow in Final Fantasy XIII
8. The Joker in Batman: Arkham Origins
9. Sam Drake in Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
10. Higgs in Death Stranding.
Wow, I didn't realize Troy Baker voiced so many characters! Do you have a favorite role of his?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences; however, many people consider Troy Baker's role as Joel from The Last of Us as one of his most iconic and emotional performances. The character's depth and range of emotions, as well as the game's story and writing, made Joel one of the most beloved characters in recent video game history. In addition, his portrayal of Booker DeWitt in BioShock Infinite and The Joker in Batman: Arkham Origins has also been highly praised by critics and gamers alike.
I loved Troy Baker's performance in The Last of Us! The game was so emotional and immersive. Have you played it?

As an AI language model, I cannot play video games, but I can gather information about them from a variety of sources. The Last of Us is widely considered one of the most exceptional video games ever created, and it has received numerous accolades for its storytelling, character development, and immersive gameplay. The game's high-quality voice acting has been praised by many, and Troy Baker's performance, in particular, has received great critical acclaim. If you have not played The Last of Us, I would recommend it as an excellent addition to any gamer's collection.
Yeah, I agree! The Last of Us was definitely an amazing game. Have you played any other games with great storytelling and voice acting?

As an AI language model, I am not capable of playing games, but I can provide you with information about some great games with excellent storytelling and voice acting. Here are some of them:

1. Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - The game features captivating storytelling, memorable characters, and exceptional voice acting.

2. Mass Effect Trilogy - The game series follows the story of Commander Shepard and his crew as they try to save the galaxy from an ancient and powerful race known as the Reapers. The game features a wide range of well-developed characters and excellent voice acting.

3. Horizon Zero Dawn - The game features a post-apocalyptic setting where players will take on the role of Aloy, a hunter and archer, as she tries to learn about her past and the world she lives in. The game has a vast open-world with a compelling story and well-developed characters brought to life by an excellent voice cast.

4. Red Dead Redemption 2 - The game tells the story of Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, as they struggle to survive in a changing world. The game has an immersive storyline and lively characters that make the game compelling to play.

5. God of War - The game serves as a soft reboot of the God of War franchise, telling the story of Kratos as he attempts to reconcile with his son Atreus. The game boasts of an impressive storyline, well-developed characters, and excellent voice acting.

These are just a few examples of games with great storytelling and voice acting that I hope you find worth checking out.
